attributes.action: Extend family permit for 1 more year
attributes.additional_details: Due to the corona virus, most European citizens could not go to their countries, could not see their loved ones and could not get married. For those who got married later, I request an extension of the Family permit visa for one more year.
attributes.background: Due to the corona virus, most European citizens could not go to their countries, could not see their loved ones and could not get married. For those who got married later, I request an extension of the Family permit visa for one more year.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want travel permits to be extended because of the Covid-19 pandemic, but we're not sure exactly what permit you want to be extended, or who for.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
